interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Masterpiece Classic: Downton Abbey Season 2 (Original U.K. Edition)
Review Date: 2013/04/08
Store: Maggie Smith  (Actor),     Hugh Bonneville  (Actor),     Julian Fellowes  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Drama
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Season 2 of the Emmy® Award-winning Downton Abbey returns as The Great War rages across Europe, and not even the serene Yorkshire countryside is free from its effects. The men and women of Downton are doing their part both on the front lines and the home front, but the intensity of war only serves to inflame the more familiar passionslove, loss, blackmail, and betrayal.', 'Review', '...it remains a glorious, escapist entertainment which, as the fabric of society is torn asunder, the economy crashes around our ears and the autumnal rain lashes down, should at least keep us distracted until Christmas. --Andrew Pettie, The TelegraphSex, blackmail, girls in nice frocks and now a war. Downton Abbey just got even better. --Sam Wollaston, The Guardian']
Average Rating: 4.9
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama/Television, Drama/British Empire', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC, Box set', 'Contributor': 'Hugh Bonneville, Julian Fellowes, Maggie Smith', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '9 hours and 4 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 5.3 x 7.5 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '551207', 'Director': 'Julian Fellowes', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC, Box set', 'Run time': '9 hours and 4 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 7, 2012', 'Actors': 'Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville', 'Studio': 'PBS (Direct)', 'Number of discs': '3'}
Review Text: Okay, I resisted Downton for three seasons, thinking it would be too 'PBS" for me.  Then a friend put it on while I was there and i was hooked.  Already devoured season 3 and can't understand why they don't make more episodes faster.
Review Title: Hooked!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Okay, I resisted Downton for three seasons, thinking it would be too 'PBS" for me.  Then a friend put it on while I was there and i was hooked.  Already devoured season 3 and can't understand why they don't make more episodes faster.
Hooked!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Media Preferences:** Strong interest in drama series, particularly those set in historical contexts or with intricate character relationships.
- **Content Style:** Enjoys high-quality, engaging storytelling with elements of love, conflict, and societal issues.
- **Platform Affinity:** Likely a fan of PBS programming, especially prominent British series.
- **Viewing Behavior:** Initially hesitant about certain series, but once engaged, becomes deeply invested and seeks out more content quickly.
- **Community Influence:** Decisions may be swayed by recommendations from friends, suggesting an openness to social viewing experiences.
- **Emotional Connection:** Values escapist entertainment that provides distraction and emotional engagement, especially amidst challenging themes like war and societal changes. 
- **Rating Tendency:** Tends to give high ratings to content that resonates with a personal impact or enjoyment.

Overall, this user exhibits a deep appreciation for compelling narratives in the drama genre, with a particular affinity for series that successfully blend historical significance with relatable human experiences.
